entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
